title: Graham Stephan on Real Estate, Investing & Living Below Your Means (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & George Kamel discuss:

How to invest in real estate and not be house poor,

Setting up a will,

Real estate, investing, & living on less than you make, with real estate investor & YouTube business personality, Graham Stephan,

Getting a spouse on board with the baby steps.


Support Our Sponsor:

Gazelle
